subject: upgrading from apache to apache2 under debian
body: 20 (return) [ Julian adopts this gross conception by ascribing to his favorite Marcus Antoninus, (C¾sares, p. 333.) The Stoics and Platonists hesitated between the analogy of bodies and the purity of spirits; yet the gravest philosophers inclined to the whimsical fancy of Aristophanes and Lucian, that an unbelieving age might starve the immortal gods. See Observations de Spanheim, p. 284, 444, &c.]
